r.d: This is the MySQL MDB2 driver.
r.n: - explicitly pass if the module is phptype specific in all loadModule calls (bug #6226) - properly handle PRIMARY keys in listTableConstraints() - apply _isIndexName() on non primary keys in getTableConstraintDefinition() - fixed signature of quoteIdentifier() to make second param optional - fixed signature of executeStoredProc() - typo fixes in error handling of nextResult() and numRows() calls - _fixIndexName() now just attempts to remove possible formatting - renamed _isSequenceName() to _fixSequenceName() - _fixSequenceName() now just attempts to remove possible formatting, and only returns a boolean if no formatting was applied when the new "check" parameter is set to true
